title: Is Cho'Gath... too large?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I believe the Cho'Gath in his current state is old and not cool and much too large. I present a newer** "cooler"** and **"slimmer"** Cho'Gath. A Cho'Gath lite if you will. Thoughts?
